sense.def:
An agreement
je odločitev, ki jo skupaj sprejmeta dve ali več oseb.

seg.quote: Half of the land was given away under the same agreement.

sense.def:
Agreement
je odločitev ali obljuba, da bomo nekaj sprejeli.

seg.quote: There was no general agreement on the timing.

sense.def:
Kadar je človek
in agreement with someone
je z nekom enakih misli.
